"Lillipan Treasure Hunt": "Protect the treasure hunting Lillipan until the end!"
"Protect the treasure hunting Lillipan until the end!"
"That Lillipan... It looks like it's searching for something."
"I see... it seems like the Lillipan is searching for some kind of treasure. Please keep it as safe as you can."
"It seems to have found what it was looking for. There's no need to keep protecting it now. Please return to the regular mission."
"Is the Lillipan alright? ...Excuse me. It's unfortunate, but you've failed to protect it. Please return to the regular mission."
"The Lillipan is headed in that direction. Whatever it's looking for might be over there, I suppose."
"It seems the Lillipan has found where to go."
"The Lillipan has arrived at its destination. Hostiles are converging on your location. Be careful, and please keep the Lillipan safe."
"The Lillipan has begun to dig again. I wonder what it's looking for... Excuse me. Stay alert."
"This seems to be the last spot. Stay sharp, protect the Lillipan until it's found what it's looking for."
"The Lillipan doesn't seem to have found anything it wanted from this location."
"We are currently escorting a Lillipan as it digs for treasures and relics. Please help out if you can."
"The Lillipan is... it seems like it's looking for something."
"That Lillipan seems to want to dig up treasure from inside the junk piles. Protect it to the best of your abilities."
"It looks like the Lillipan found what it was looking for. There's no need to keep defending it. Return to the regular mission."
"You failed to protect the Lillipan. Well, these things happen. Return to the regular mission."
"The Lillipan seems to want to go in that direction."
"It seems the Lillipan has found where to go."
"The Lillipan really enjoys digging, doesn't it? ...Hostiles should be arriving any second. Don't let your guard down."
"The Lillipan has started digging again. ...Same drill as before. Watch for signs of hostiles in the area."
"This seems like the last site. Stay alert until it's done digging."
"Hmm... it doesn't seem to have found anything it wants here."
"A Lillipan is currently being escorted as it looks for relics. Lend a hand if you can."

"Oh, what's this? That's a Lillipan,
isn't it? It looks like it's searching
for something..."
"Hmm, it seems like it wants to try to uncover treasures or something from the junk piles. Would you mind keeping it safe?"
"You did it! The Lillipan was able to safely find a treasure because of your help! Good work!"
"Oh no... that poor Lillipan... You failed to keep it safe. Please return to the regular mission."
"It's headed in that direction!"
"Oh, it seems the Lillipan has found where to go!"
"The Lillipan has begun to dig! The enemies will probably be here soon, so please keep an eye out for them!"
"The Lillipan has begun digging again! Just like last time, watch out for enemies!"
"This looks like the last place! Please keep protecting it!"
"It seems like this place didn't work out. Head to the next place!"
"We're in the middle of escorting a Lillipan right now. If you can, please meet up with the other ARKS and join the mission!"
